barren.translation[0].definitions[0].def: land or soil that is barren has no plants growing on it
barren.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Thousands of years ago the surface was barren desert.
barren.translation[0].definitions[1].def: unable to produce children or baby animals – used of a woman or of female animals
barren.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a tree or plant that is barren does not produce fruit or seeds
barren.translation[0].definitions[3].def: used to describe something that does not look interesting or attractive
barren.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: The sports hall was a rather barren concrete building.
barren.translation[0].definitions[4].def: used to describe a period of time during which you do not achieve anything or get any useful results
barren.translation[0].definitions[4].exa: I scored five in the first seven games, but I’ve had a bit of a barren patch since then.
